titleStmt.title: John McClaren to Thomas E. Bramlette
CWG2059

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Appointments by the Governor, Civil Appointments, 1863-1867

body.p:
JOHN M'CLAREN,
Attorney at Law,
OFFICE,
NO. 74 GRANT STREET,
One Door below the Court House,
PITTSBURGH, PA.
Collections made and promptly remitted.

Pittsburgh, March 25 1865
Hon. Thomas E. Bramlette
Governor of the State of Kentucky.
The undersigned would respectfully make application for the appointment of, Commissioner for the State of Kentucky,

Hon. Thos E. Bramlette
Governor of Kentucky.
We recommend the above applicant

Wilsone W Candless
U S Judge
Edwin H. Stowe
Associate Law Judge
Com Pleas
Allegheny Co
Pa

Comr Deeds
Pennsylvania
John McClaren
apptd &
comd
29th Mch/65
